DOC.brief_summary: This study test whether people receive clinician support use mobile application smartphone manage post-traumatic stress disorder ( PTSD ) symptoms good . Half participant receive clinician support smartphone application intervention half remain wait list .
DOC.brief_title: A Smartphone Intervention With Telemedicine Support Management Post-traumatic Stress Disorder : A Randomized Trial
